name: The Pizzas Have Guns
description:
Want a pizza this!?

In The Pizzas Have Guns, two players take control of sentient pizza crusts stuck in the Pizza Gladiators' Colosseum and must properly turn their opponent into a well prepared pizza by following the provided recipe and shooting the ingredients at the other crust before the time runs out. But be careful, one wrong ingredient and you'll have to reset your enemy crust with the Resetter Gun. First to 5 out of 8 rounds wins!

A game by Alex Sanchez, Johnny Corde, and Nour David
